ing: 1 fluid ounce Irish cream liqueur (such as Bailey'sÂ®)
1 fluid ounce creme de menthe liqueur
des: "This delightful shooter will have you begging for more. With a flavor that is just like the thin mint cookies, what could go wrong!"
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; add vodka, Irish cream liqueur, and creme de menthe. Put lid on shaker, shake to chill liquid, and strain into a shot glass.
